statements: SELECT * FROM communication_history;
SELECT communication_date, interaction_type, agent_id FROM communication_history ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, interaction_type FROM communication_history WHERE policyholder_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE agent_id IS NULL;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_content FROM communication_history WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE communication_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT communication_id, interaction_type, communication_date FROM communication_history WHERE agent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY communication_date DESC
SELECT policyholder_id, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM communication_history GROUP BY policyholder_id HAVING num_interactions > 3
SELECT agent_id, AVG(LENGTH(communication_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM communication_history WHERE agent_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY agent_id
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM communication_history ORDER BY interaction_type
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE agent_id = 123;
SELECT communication_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT policy_id, document_type, document_date FROM policy_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(communication_id) AS total_communications FROM communication_history GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(document_id) AS avg_document_id FROM policy_documents GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_history WHERE policyholder_id = 100 ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT communication_content, communication_date FROM communication_history WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND agent_id = 50;
SELECT communication_id, communication_type FROM communication_history WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT communication_date, communication_content FROM communication_history WHERE agent_id IN (10, 20, 30) AND policyholder_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE policy_id = 500 AND document_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders
SELECT name, email FROM Agents
SELECT phone_number FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Communications WHERE communication_type = 'email'
SELECT name, communication_type FROM Agents INNER JOIN Communications ON Agents.agent_id = Communications.agent_id
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, email FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT ph.name, ag.name, c.communication_type FROM Policyholders ph INNER JOIN Communications c ON ph.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id INNER JOIN Agents ag ON c.agent_id = ag.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM Communications WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT ph.name AS policyholder_name, ag.name AS agent_name, c.communication_type AS communication_type FROM Policyholders ph INNER JOIN Communications c ON ph.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id INNER JOIN Agents ag ON c.agent_id = ag.agent_id WHERE ph.name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM emails ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender, recipient, subject FROM emails WHERE subject LIKE '%Important%' ORDER BY email_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM phone_calls WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT policyholder, agent, details FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type = 'Claim' ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE sender = 'john.doe@example.com' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type, agent, timestamp FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type = 'insurance' AND agent = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT interaction_type, policyholder, agent, details FROM interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT call_id, caller, receiver, duration FROM phone_calls WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY call_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM policy_documents GROUP BY document_type ORDER BY total_documents DESC;
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE recipient_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT sender_email, subject FROM emails WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policyholder_id, name FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT document_id, document_type, approval_status FROM policy_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT agent_id, name, region FROM agents WHERE email = 'agent@example.com';
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE sender_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT subject, recipient_email FROM emails WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT document_type, document_content FROM policy_documents WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM agents ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT call_id, call_duration, call_type FROM phone_calls WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_duration DESC;
